about.title: About Us
about.description: Meta Mining Media (MMM) is a digital producer and agency specialized in the mining sector. Its purpose is to connect companies, suppliers and clusters with their main audiences through creative proposals and high-impact content. Under MMM, three flagship productions are developed that reflect the dynamism and evolution of the industry.
about.extendedDescription: The project is born from the experience of CODEa UNI, an educational organization that has brought together thousands of students and mining professionals from different countries. From that academic and community base, Meta Mining Media emerges as a natural evolution that drives new ways of communicating, inspiring and strengthening bonds within the mining ecosystem. Our essence is marked by the commitment to innovation, knowledge generation and the creation of meeting spaces that transcend the digital. In this way, we seek not only to tell mining stories, but also to contribute to the development of a global community that values, shares and projects the future of the sector.

items.question: What level of customization do the services have?
items.answer: Each service is designed based on an analysis of the client's needs. We don't offer standard solutions, but projects that integrate creativity, technical knowledge and strategic vision. This allows us to align each delivery with the company's identity and the objectives it seeks to achieve in the mining or industrial sector.

items.question: Can several services be combined in the same project?
items.answer: Yes. In fact, many of our clients combine different services to get an integral plan. By working this way we achieve more coherent and consistent communication, with pieces and actions that complement each other. This generates greater impact and ensures that efforts translate into measurable results.

items.question: Do you offer support or accompaniment after delivery?
items.answer: Yes, our commitment does not end with delivery. We offer post-project support that includes advice, improvement recommendations and strategic adjustments. This accompaniment ensures that the client can make the most of the results and adapt communication to new needs or changes in the market.

items.question: How are costs and budgets determined?
items.answer: Costs are determined based on the complexity, scope and timing of the project. We ensure that we present clear and transparent budgets, detailing each phase of the work. This methodology allows us to maintain trust and ensure that the client knows exactly what value they will receive with the investment made.

items.question: What do I need to prepare before hiring a service?
items.answer: The client only needs to define their main objectives and share relevant information about their company. From there, our team takes care of guiding the entire process. This dynamic reduces the operational burden for the client and allows us to focus on creating adapted solutions that generate real results.
